scripts.build:js: browserify src/modules/app.js > dist/js/simput.js && uglifyjs dist/js/simput.js -o dist/js/simput-min.js --source-map dist/js/simput-min.js.map --source-map-root /js/simput.js
scripts.build:jade: templatizer -d src/modules -o dist/js/simput-tpls.js && uglifyjs dist/js/simput-tpls.js -o dist/js/simput-tpls-min.js --source-map dist/js/simput-tpls-min.js.map --source-map-root /js/simput-tpls-min.js
scripts.build: parallelshell 'cp src/index.html dist/index.html' 'npm run vendors' 'npm run build:css' 'npm run build:js' 'npm run build:jade' 'npm run compile'
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev -s & parallelshell 'npm run live-reload -s' 'npm run serve -s' 'npm run watch:build -s'
scripts.compile:sample: node scripts/SimPut-compiler.js -p ./simulations/sample -o dist/js/sample.js -n sample -d sample-data.json -t sample.txt
scripts.compile:hydra: node scripts/SimPut-compiler.js -p ./simulations/hydra  -o dist/js/hydra.js  -n hydra -d hydra-data.json -t hydra.ctln
scripts.compile: npm run compile:sample && npm run compile:hydra
